word_mean: 粘液质的，迟钝的：以所谓粘液过多为其特征的，因而指沉重、迟钝和冷漠的

sentence.Network_en: He is too still, unmoved, phlegmatic to be happy.
sentence.Network_cn: 他太安静 、 太冷淡,太不动感情, 因而郁郁不欢.

sentence.Network_en: The mathematician , Yurchenko , was a stubby , phlegmatic , shrewd person.
sentence.Network_cn: 数学教师 尤尔钦科 是个矮胖的, 冷漠而机灵的人.

sentence.Network_en: The British character is often said to be phlegmatic.
sentence.Network_cn: 英国人的性格常说成是冷漠的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'relating to the humour phlegm'): from Old French fleumatique, via Latin from Greek phlegmatikos, from phlegma 'inflammation' (see phlegm)

entry.tran: 临危不惧的；冷静的；沉着的
entry.def: Someone who is phlegmatic stays calm even when upsetting or exciting things happen.

example.ex: ...a most phlegmatic man, steadily working on as the rain splashed down.
example.tran: 大雨倾盆而下时仍能沉稳工作的非常冷静的人

auth_sentence.content: He was a phlegmatic character who approached his racing with an analytical style.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a phlegmatic character who approached his racing with an analytical style.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was a phlegmatic character who approached his racing with an analytical style.

auth_sentence.content: If you play golf long enough you have to be phlegmatic about it.
auth_sentence.res_content: If you play golf long enough you have to be phlegmatic about it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If you play golf long enough you have to be phlegmatic about it.

auth_sentence.content: The list would bring tears to the eyes of the most phlegmatic dentist.

stems_affixes.word_buile: charisma魅力,感召力+atic有……性质的→adj.有魅力的
dogma教条+atic有……性质的→adj.教条的,教义的
emblem象征,徽章+atic有……性质的→adj.作为象征的
err错误+atic有……性质的→被人认为错误的→古怪的
fan入迷者+atic有……性质的→adj.狂热的,盲信的 n.狂热者
pragm行动+atic有……性质的→adj.实际的,实用主义的
problem问题+atic有……性质的→adj.有问题的
system系统+atic有……性质的→adj.系统的,体系的
phlegm痰,古人认为痰多者冷静自控,沉着+atic有……性质的→adj.冷静的,冷淡的
fan入迷者+atic有……性质的→adj.狂热的,盲信的 n.狂热者

means.word_mean: 冷静的,镇定的;迟钝的,冷漠的
